## CollapsibleLabelCssClasses interface

The CSS class interface used for [CollapsibleLabel()](./answers-react-components.collapsiblelabel.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CollapsibleLabelCssClasses extends CheckboxOptionCssClasses 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [CheckboxOptionCssClasses](./answers-react-components.checkboxoptioncssclasses.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [label?](./answers-react-components.collapsiblelabelcssclasses.label.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to the label. |
|  [labelContainer?](./answers-react-components.collapsiblelabelcssclasses.labelcontainer.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to outermost container of the label and its children element. |
|  [labelIcon?](./answers-react-components.collapsiblelabelcssclasses.labelicon.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to the dropdown icon. |
